32#ifndef _OPENSOLARIS_MNTTAB_H_
33#define _OPENSOLARIS_MNTTAB_H_
34
35#include <sys/param.h>
36#include <sys/mount.h>
37
38#include <stdio.h>
39#include <paths.h>
40
41#define MNTTAB _PATH_DEVNULL
42#define MNT_LINE_MAX 1024
43
44#if 0
45#define MS_OVERLAY 0x0
46#define MS_NOMNTTAB 0x0
47#define MS_RDONLY 0x1
48
49#define umount2(p, f) unmount(p, f)
50#endif
51
52struct mnttab {
53 char *mnt_special;
54 char *mnt_mountp;
55 char *mnt_fstype;
56 char *mnt_mntopts;
57};
58#define extmnttab mnttab
59
60int getmntany(FILE *fd, struct mnttab *mgetp, struct mnttab *mrefp);
61int getmntent(FILE *fp, struct mnttab *mp);
62char *hasmntopt(struct mnttab *mnt, char *opt);
63
64struct statvfs;
65void statvfs2mnttab(struct statvfs *sfs, struct mnttab *mp);
66
67#endif /* !_OPENSOLARIS_MNTTAB_H_ */
68
